inkball

Class LineSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.LineSegment

  • public class LineSegment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a line segment in the game. Line segments are used to draw player-drawn lines, create hitboxes for wall tiles, and check for collisions with the ball. Each segment has a starting and ending point defined by its coordinates.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draw the line segment on the game window. The line is drawn with a stroke color (black) and a stroke weight (10 pixels).
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet object used to draw the line segment.
